title: How do I get IP boosts?
body: I know you can buy them in game, but I recall getting some for free when I first started the game through my email. Was that a one time thing, or is it earnable?

replies.body: Rest in Peace double IP weekends....

I believe you're referring to the [email verification bonus](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/riot-games/announcements/earn-4-win-ip-boost-verifying-your-email) that provides a 4-Win IP Boost.  This is a once per account kind of thing, so it own't be possible to repeat earn the bonus.  Let me know if that clears things up!
